Intro
=====

This package contains a simple viewlet, which is shown next to the
logo and holds images, collected out of a specified folder. Only one
of the Images is shown at the same time and via jquery they are
shifting dynamicly.

It is possible to specifiy the delay, the animationspeed, the
animation itself, the id of the sourcefolder and to load the images
sequential or random.

If no javascript is available, the viewlet only render one of the
images. If you choose random, only one random image is rendered.

This package also give you the posibility to use different banners at
different places of your site.
